title: OpenClaw Documentation - Getting Started
notes: Official docs for the platform running Opportunity Engine. Review Skills and Memory sections.

title: ClawHub - OpenClaw Skill Marketplace
notes: Official skill marketplace. 48+ pre-built skills. Browse: github, notion, weather, himalaya. Can also publish Opportunity Engine as skill.

title: Installed Skill: github - GitHub CLI
notes: Manage GitHub repos, issues, PRs. Requires: gh auth login

title: Installed Skill: notion - Notion CLI
notes: Create/manage Notion pages and databases. Requires: NOTION_TOKEN

title: Installed Skill: himalaya - Email CLI
notes: Email management via IMAP/SMTP. Requires: Email credentials

title: WebClaw - Next.js AI Starter Template
notes: Next.js 14 + TypeScript + Tailwind + shadcn/ui starter for AI apps. Reference for potential Opportunity Engine rebuild in React.

title: CRITICAL: OpenClaw Update Recovery Guide
notes: EMERGENCY: Step-by-step recovery if OpenClaw update breaks. Pre-update checklist, recovery scenarios, nuclear rollback option.
